proverAddress: An address of the prover contract
ethConnectorAddress: An address of the ETH connector (EthCustodian) contract
nearRecipient: An address of the recipient account on NEAR
ethRecipientOnNear: An ETH address of the recipient on NEAR EVM
amountToTransfer: The amount that will be deposited. Fill the value here without quotes
fee: The fee that will be paid to the relayer. Fill the value here without quotes
